document_data.name: Eldroon
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldroon''' was a minor noble house of [[Cormyr]].<ref>
document_data.History:
They were a minor noble family of [[Marsember]] while it was an independent city.

The Eldroons encouraged the [[Marliir]]s to fight against Cormyr, then switched sides when King [[Dhalmass]] attacked in [[1227 DR]]. [[Rhodes Marliir]] suspected the Eldroons of even guiding the Cormyreans through the marshes outside Marsember and to the city gates. They later celebrated Marsember's incorporation into the kingdom of Cormyr.
